item.title: UI-TARS: Pioneering Automated GUI Interaction with Native Agents
item.description: UI-TARS, a novel native GUI agent, achieves state-of-the-art performance by solely using screenshots as input, eliminating the need for complex agent frameworks and expert-designed workflows.
